alert.note: Alert for Osage; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 1:57AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Osage and west central Washington Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 157 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Foraker to 4 miles west of Wynona. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Pawhuska... Bigheart... Pearsonia... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Hulah... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Okesa... Wah Sha She State Park... Tallant... Pershing... Nelagoney... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
